trans: To unsettle someone means to make them anxious or worried.

name: warp
trans: To warp means to become bent into the wrong shape.

name: accumulate
trans: To accumulate something is to collect a lot of it over time.

name: aerial
trans: When something is aerial, it relates to being in the air or flying.

name: apparatus
trans: An apparatus is a device used for a particular purpose.

name: avalanche
trans: An avalanche is a large amount of snow, ice, and rock falling off a mountain.

name: consistency
trans: Consistency is the state of always behaving in the same way.

name: discharge
trans: To discharge someone is to allow them to leave from a place, usually a hospital.

name: episode
trans: An episode is something that happens as part of a series of events.

name: intact
trans: When something is intact, it is complete and not damaged.

name: mortal
trans: When a person is mortal, they cannot live forever.

name: omen
trans: An omen is a sign of what will happen in the future.

name: overcast
trans: When the sky is overcast, it is full of clouds and is not sunny.

name: poignant
trans: When something is poignant, it causes a very strong feeling of sadness.

name: ranger
trans: A ranger is a person who protects forests or parks.

name: rubble
trans: Rubble is piles of broken stone and wood created after a building is destroyed.

name: seclude
trans: To seclude someone means to keep them away from other people.

name: sideways
trans: If something moves sideways, then it moves to or from the side.

name: sob
trans: To sob is to cry loudly.

name: sober
trans: When something or someone is sober, they are serious and calm.

name: speck
trans: A speck is a very small mark or amount.

name: upbringing
trans: An upbringing is the way that someone is taught to behave by their parents.

name: bliss
trans: Bliss is a state of complete happiness.

name: butler
trans: A butler is the most important male servant in a wealthy house.

name: cramp
trans: A cramp is a strong pain caused by a muscle after a lot of physical use.

name: decorate
trans: When you decorate a room, you make it more attractive by adding beautiful things to it.

name: dilapidated
trans: When a building is dilapidated, it is old and in bad condition.

name: evoke
trans: To evoke a memory or emotion means to make it occur.

name: farewell
trans: A farewell is an instance of saying goodbye or a way to say it.

name: faucet
trans: A faucet is a device that controls the flow of a liquid or gas.

name: filth
trans: Filth is dirt or dirty things that disgust you.

name: flaw
trans: A flaw is a mistake in something that causes it to be less effective or correct.

name: grin
trans: To grin means to smile broadly.

name: housekeeping
trans: Housekeeping is the maintenance of a house or an establishment like a hotel.

name: mound
trans: A mound of something is a large pile of it.

name: numb
trans: When a body part is numb, it does not have any feeling.

name: reckless
trans: When people are reckless, they act in an unsafe way.

name: slate
trans: Slate is a dark grey rock that can easily be split into layers.

name: stool
trans: A stool is a seat with legs but no support for a person’s arms and back.

name: testament
trans: A testament to something shows that it exists or is true.

name: timber
trans: Timber is wood that is used for building houses and making furniture.

name: valve
trans: A valve is a device attached to a pipe and controls the flow of liquid or air.

name: camouflage
trans: Camouflage is something used to hide people and things.

name: confront
trans: When you confront someone, you meet them face to face to deal with a problem.

name: contemplate
trans: To contemplate something means to think about it.

name: contend
trans: To contend with something means to struggle to overcome it.

name: cot
trans: A cot is a small portable bed.

name: enlist
trans: To enlist means to join the military.

name: frontier
trans: A frontier is a border between two regions or countries.

name: guerilla
trans: A guerilla is a person who fights as part of an unofficial army.

name: handbook
trans: A handbook is material that gives specific information or instructions.

name: hesitant
trans: If someone is hesitant, then they are not sure or are slow to act or speak.

name: lush
trans: If something is lush, then it is full of a variety of large, healthy plants.

name: outfit
trans: An outfit is a set of clothes worn together, often for a certain job or event.

name: paw
trans: A paw is an animal’s foot that has claws or soft pads.

name: splendid
trans: If something or someone is splendid, then they are very good.

name: stray
trans: To stray means to go in a wrong direction and become lost.

name: substantial
trans: If something is substantial, then it is of great importance, size, or value.

name: torch
trans: A torch is a stick with one end on fire that can be carried in order to give light.

name: tract
trans: A tract is a large area of land.

name: vigil
trans: A vigil is a period of watchful attention at night for a specific purpose.

name: weary
trans: If someone is weary, then they are tired.

name: amid
trans: If something is amid something else, then it is in the middle of it.

name: backstage
trans: If something happens backstage, it occurs behind a theater’s stage.

name: billionaire
trans: A billionaire is someone who has at least one billion dollars.

name: brute
trans: A brute is someone who behaves or looks like a violent animal.

name: clumsy
trans: If someone is clumsy, then they are awkward in handling things.

name: collide
trans: To collide with something means to hit it while moving.

name: culprit
trans: A culprit is someone who has committed a crime or other bad deed.

name: evacuate
trans: To evacuate means to leave a place of danger to a place of safety.

name: flammable
trans: If something is flammable, then it is able to catch on fire.

name: mob
trans: A mob is a large crowd of people that often wants to cause violence.

name: premature
trans: If something is premature, then it is done too early or before the proper time.

name: resent
trans: To resent something means to have bad feelings about it.

name: satire
trans: A satire is a work of art that uses humor and irony to make fun of something.

name: scrutiny
trans: Scrutiny is the careful examination of something.

name: segregate
trans: To segregate something means to place it in a group apart from other things.

name: subject
trans: To subject someone to something means to force them to do or experience it.

name: testify
trans: To testify means to give evidence as a witness.

name: tumult
trans: A tumult is a loud and confused noise made by a large crowd of people.

name: underestimate
trans: To underestimate something or someone means to think less of them than they really are.

name: uproar
trans: Uproar is loud noise caused by people who are very angry or upset.

name: accelerate
trans: To accelerate means to increase in speed.

name: anew
trans: If you do something anew, you do it again, possibly in a different way.

name: defect
trans: A defect is a part of something that is wrong or missing.

name: dreary
trans: If something is dreary, then it is dull, dark, and lifeless.

name: duplicate
trans: To duplicate something means to copy it.

name: electromagnetic
trans: If something is electromagnetic, it is related to electricity and magnetic fields.

name: electron
trans: An electron is a particle in all atoms that has a negative electric charge.

name: glide
trans: To glide means to fly on extended wings with little or no effort.

name: ingenious
trans: If someone is ingenious, then they are very smart.

name: innovation
trans: An innovation is a product, or an idea, that is new or very original.

name: innovative
trans: If something or someone is innovative, they can think in creative ways.

name: launch
trans: To launch something means to make it go into motion.

name: meteorological
trans: If something is meteorological, it is concerned with the science of weather.

name: meteorology
trans: Meteorology is the science that studies the weather.

name: penetrate
trans: To penetrate something means to enter into it.

name: persistent
trans: A persistent person does not give up and keeps on working.

name: propulsion
trans: Propulsion is the force that moves something forward.

name: simulate
trans: To simulate something means to copy its actions or characteristics.

name: spur
trans: To spur someone means to urge them into action.

name: stimulate
trans: To stimulate something means to cause or to increase activity in it.

name: beforehand
trans: If something is done beforehand, then it is done in advance.

name: blurred
trans: Something blurred is not seen clearly.

name: centigrade
trans: If a temperature is given in centigrade, it is the same as the temperature in Celsius.

name: chatter
trans: To chatter means to talk quickly about unimportant things.

name: concerto
trans: A concerto is music played with an orchestra but features a solo instrument.

name: condense
trans: To condense a gas means to make it a liquid.

name: deteriorate
trans: To deteriorate means to become steadily worse.

name: degree
trans: Degree is a unit for measuring temperature.

name: exterior
trans: An exterior is the outside surface of something.

name: hearty
trans: If someone or something is hearty, then they are loud and happy.

name: hospitable
trans: If someone is hospitable, they are friendly to strangers.

name: humor
trans: Humor can be something that makes you laugh, and it can also refer to your feelings.

name: manor
trans: A manor is a large house with many rooms.

name: monastery
trans: A monastery is a building in which monks live.

name: nursery
trans: A nursery is a room where babies and children sleep, play, or are cared for.

name: outstretched
trans: If something is outstretched, then it is extended to its full length.

name: parcel
trans: A parcel is a package of things to be carried or mailed somewhere.

name: profile
trans: A profile is an outline of a face, usually as seen from the side.

name: winding
trans: If something is winding, then it follows a twisting course.

name: zip
trans: To zip something means to close it with a zipper.

name: abolish
trans: To abolish something means to put an end to it, such as a system or law.

name: amend
trans: To amend something means to change it to improve or make it accurate.

name: aspire
trans: To aspire means to have a strong desire to achieve or do something.

name: censor
trans: To censor information means to remove it if it is dangerous, rude, or rebellious.

name: charter
trans: A charter is a document that describes the rights of an organization or group.

name: constitution
trans: A constitution is a document of principles for a government.

name: cosmopolitan
trans: When a place is cosmopolitan, it is full of people from many different places.

name: disseminate
trans: To disseminate information or knowledge means to distribute it.

name: flatter
trans: To fatter people means to praise them in an effort to please them.

name: infamous
trans: When someone is infamous, they are well known for something bad.

name: lame
trans: If one is lame, they cannot walk properly due to an injury to the leg or foot.

name: limp
trans: To limp means to walk with difficulty because someone’s leg or foot is hurt.

name: outburst
trans: An outburst is a sudden, strong expression of an emotion.

name: pathological
trans: When a behavior is pathological, it is extreme, unacceptable, and sometimes a symptom of disease.

name: phenomenal
trans: When something is phenomenal, it is unusually great.

name: poll
trans: A poll is a survey in which people give their opinions about important things.

name: remorse
trans: Remorse is a strong feeling of sadness and regret.

name: secrecy
trans: Secrecy is the behavior of keeping things secret.

name: tackle
trans: To tackle something means to deal with it in a determined and efficient way.

name: trance
trans: A trance is a state where people seem asleep and have no control of themselves.

name: coward
trans: A coward is a person who lacks courage to do risky or dangerous things.

name: delete
trans: To delete something means to remove or erase written material.

name: earnest
trans: If someone is earnest, then they are honest.

name: ethnic
trans: If something is ethnic, then it is related to a group with a similar culture.

name: exclude
trans: To exclude someone means to not accept them into a group.

name: firsthand
trans: If something is firsthand, then it is from an original source.

name: fluent
trans: If someone is fluent in a language, then they are able to speak it very well.

name: imperial
trans: If something is imperial, then it is related to an empire.

name: inclusive
trans: If something is inclusive, then it is open to all groups and people in society.

name: legislature
trans: A legislature is the section of a government that makes laws.

name: linguistic
trans: If something is linguistic, then it is concerned with language.

name: monolingual
trans: If someone is monolingual, then they speak only one language.

name: nationality
trans: Nationality is an identity based on the nation from which you come.

name: patriot
trans: A patriot is someone who loves, supports, and defends their country.

name: prosecute
trans: To prosecute someone means to take legal action against them.

name: racial
trans: If something is racial, then it is related to a race or races.

name: solemn
trans: If something is solemn, then it is serious and honest.

name: solidarity
trans: Solidarity is a union formed from common responsibilities or interests.

name: tact
trans: Tact is the ability to avoid offending people when dealing with problems.

name: undermine
trans: To undermine someone means to betray them or weaken their efforts or authority.

name: constrain
trans: To constrain something means to limit its development.

name: depot
trans: A depot is a bus or train station.

name: emulate
trans: To emulate people means to imitate them because they are greatly admired.

name: forefinger
trans: The forefinger is the finger between one’s thumb and middle finger.

name: guts
trans: The guts are all the organs inside a person or animal.

name: inherent
trans: When something is inherent, it is a natural part of something else.

name: intimidate
trans: To intimidate means to frighten others.

name: janitor
trans: A janitor is a person who makes repairs and takes care of a building.

name: moist
trans: When something is moist, it is slightly wet.

name: nope
trans: Nope is an informal way of saying “no.”

name: prod
trans: To prod means to push someone or something with a finger or pointed object.

name: ransom
trans: A ransom is a sum of money paid to a kidnapper to set the person free.

name: restrain
trans: To restrain someone or something means to use physical strength to stop them.

name: saliva
trans: Saliva is the watery liquid in people’s mouths that helps in digestion.

name: spit
trans: To spit means to force liquid from one’s mouth.

name: sprint
trans: To sprint means to run very fast over a short distance.

name: stunt
trans: A stunt is something that is done in order to get attention or publicity.

name: tolerant
trans: When people are tolerant, they are respectful of others’ rights and beliefs.

name: vampire
trans: A vampire is a fictional monster that sleeps in a coffin and sucks people’s blood.

name: yawn
trans: To yawn means to open one’s mouth wide and breathe in air.

name: adjoining
trans: If something is adjoining, it is next to or joined with a building or room.

name: allege
trans: To allege something is to say that it is true without offering proof.

name: arch
trans: An arch is a curved opening formed under a structure such as a bridge or doorway.

name: assemble
trans: To assemble means to get together in one place.

name: casualty
trans: A casualty is a person killed or injured in a war or an accident.

name: erect
trans: To erect something means to build it.

name: foul
trans: If something is foul, then it is very unpleasant.

name: hectare
trans: A hectare is a unit of measure equal to 10,000 square meters.

name: heighten
trans: To heighten an emotion means to increase the intensity of it.

name: hospitality
trans: Hospitality is friendly behavior and entertainment, shown to guests or strangers.

name: mansion
trans: A mansion is a large and expensive home.

name: outnumber
trans: To outnumber a group means to have a greater number than it.

name: overjoyed
trans: If someone is overjoyed, then they are extremely happy.

name: pasture
trans: A pasture is an area of land covered with grass for animals to use as food.

name: petition
trans: A petition is a written request asking an authority to do something.

name: renovate
trans: To renovate a building means to repair it, or to build new structures on it.

name: revise
trans: To revise something means to change it, or update it to make it better.

name: slab
trans: A slab is a large, thick, flat piece of stone, concrete, metal, or wood.

name: terrace
trans: A terrace is an open area that is connected to a house or an apartment.

name: turf
trans: Turf is a section of grass and the dirt in which it grows.

name: analogous
trans: If something is analogous to another thing, then it is like it in certain ways.

name: binoculars
trans: Binoculars are a device used for seeing things that are far away.

name: bulk
trans: The bulk of something is its size.

name: comprise
trans: If something comprises something else, it consists of or is made up of it.

name: depict
trans: To depict something means to show or portray it, often using art.

name: dual
trans: If something is dual, then it is made up of two parts.

name: Fahrenheit
trans: Fahrenheit is a temperature scale where water freezes at 32° and boils at 212°.

name: fulfill
trans: To fulfill something means to achieve or finish it.

name: grove
trans: A grove is a small group of trees.

name: ore
trans: Ore is the raw form of rock or material from which a valuable metal is taken.

name: outback
trans: The outback is the wild inland region of Australia where very few people live.

name: outweigh
trans: To outweigh something means to exceed it in value, amount, or importance.

name: paradox
trans: A paradox is a true statement or real event that seems illogical.

name: pier
trans: A pier is a structure that extends into a body of water.

name: shortcut
trans: A shortcut is a route that is shorter than the main route.

name: tariff
trans: A tariff is a tax or fee paid on certain imports or exports.

name: thermometer
trans: A thermometer is a device that measures temperature.

name: tilt
trans: To tilt something means to tip it into a sloping position.

name: vice versa
trans: If a statement is vice versa, then its two main ideas are switched with one another.

name: whereabouts
trans: The whereabouts of someone or something is the place where they are.
